messages.content: lollms_nodes_suite is a set of nodes for comfyui that harnesses the power of lollms, a state-of-the-art AI text generation tool, to improve the quality of image generation.
Which version of Python is supported by lollms_nodes_suite?
How do I install lollms_nodes_suite for comfyui?
To install lollms_nodes_suite, clone the repository to the `custom_nodes` folder of your comfyui installation and then install the dependencies using pip.
What tools do I need to use lollms_nodes_suite?
To use lollms_nodes_suite, you need Python 3.6 or higher, comfyui, lollms, and the lollms_nodes_suite package installed as a custom node package in your comfyui installation.
Is lollms_nodes_suite open to community contributions?
Yes, we welcome contributions from the community. Follow the contributing guidelines in the [Contributing guidelines](./CONTRIBUTING.md) document.
Which license is lollms_nodes_suite released under?
lollms_nodes_suite is released under the [Apache 2.0 License](./LICENSE).
Where can I get additional help or support for lollms_nodes_suite?
You can reach out to the creators through Discord, Twitter, Reddit, or Instagram as listed under the [Contact](#contact) section.
